QuestData.Title: Fenbush Berries
QuestData.Description: We're good on provisions, but we're in need of some medicine. Half the camp's fiercely hung over, and a remedy's in order.$B$BLuckily, I know a good folk remedy taught to me by my dear old mum. We just need some local ingredients.$B$BGather me some fenbush berries, if you would. They keep to where there's water and shade, so look along the shore and near other plants.
QuestData.RewardText: These'll do nicely. I'll have the lads back on their feet as soon as I make these somewhat edible.
